name: 吳忠敏
objective: 本課程旨在探討供應鏈與物流管理之相關議題。物流管理為供應鏈管理重要之一環。供應鏈管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含供應鏈管理之策略發展、物流管理、供應鏈管理之相關功能、供應鏈管理之績效衡量、及供應鏈管理之主要困難點。本課程將同時探討與供應鏈管理相關之議題，如存貨理論、資訊系統整合、及供應契約等。本課程理論與實務並重、案例研討也將為本課程重要之一環。
schedule:
Week 1-2: Role of logistic management in modern business world
Week 3-4: Development of global logistics strategies
Week 5-6: Global dimensions of logistic management
Week 7-8: Global logistics functions
Week 9-10: Global logistics business models
Week 11-12: Supply chain management overview
Week 13-14: Supply chain management information system
Week 15-16: Inventory policy and supply contract
Week 17-18: Logistic and supply chain management performance measurements
scorePolicy:
Final Project 30%
Midterm Exam 20%
Hands-on Practice 20%
Homework and Casework 20%
Class Participation – (Think and Discuss) 10%
materials: Text book: Managing Supply Chains – A Logistic Approach, Langley/Coyle, Eighth Edition,華泰文化
